nodes.text: The MD-series medical droid was a model of medical droid. One MD-series droid, Emdee, served the First Order.

The MD-series medical droid first appeared in Choose Your Destiny: A Finn & Poe Adventure which was written by Cavan Scott and illustrated by Elsa Charretier. The adventure book was released on  October 4, 2019. In Star Wars Legends the droid first appeared in The Glove of Darth Vader which was released on June 1, 1992
